DiamondMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
DiamondMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

DiamondMod:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
DiamondMod:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
DiamondMod:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

DiamondMod:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
DiamondMod:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

DiamondMod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
DiamondMod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !DiamondMod:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

DiamondMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
DiamondMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !DiamondMod:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.

DiamondMod:BrokenSoul.NAME: Broken Soul
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain !M! Toxin.
